name: chocolate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 [ U ] a sweet, usually brown, food made from cacao seeds, that is usually sold in a block and is often used as a flavour for desserts, drinks, etc.: a bar of chocolate milk/dark/white chocolate
Pannonia/E+/GettyImages
[ C ] a small sweet made from chocolate: I took her a box of chocolates. I like the chocolates with the caramel in the middle.
[ C or U ] UK a hot drink made from milk or water, powdered chocolate, and sugar: I was tucked up in bed with a mug of chocolate. Don't drink anything with caffeine (coffee, tea, cola, or chocolate) close to bedtime. Synonym
hot chocolate
subjug/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ U ] a dark brown colour: The picture shows the top in apricot teamed with the skirt in chocolate. That deep chocolate on the walls looks beautiful.
epic11/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesYou can use cocoa powder to make the cake rather than chocolate - it's a bit of a cheat, but nobody notices the difference.I absolutely adore chocolate.He was chomping away on a bar of chocolate.I have to combat this constant desire to eat chocolate.Melt the chocolate to a pouring consistency.Do you want another chocolate?
